title: Lazuli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Juice bar, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers several vegan items, including a chickpea curry, smoothies and juices. Small with a few tables. Chill music. Each meal is cooked to-order in a small kitchen. Located next to Dolphin Cafe and Stone Town Cafe. Open for lunch and dinner, coffee, tea and snacks.
